title: Casefile #03/12/2021-A ("The Liberal Vampire")

@@ @@

[[div class="blockquote"]]

= **INTERNAL ZM "WITCH SLAYER" DIVISION CASEFILE DOCUMENTATION**

= **DO NOT DISSEMINATE**

------

**Case ID:** #03/12/2021-A ("The Liberal Vampire")

**Case Status:** __ACTIVE__

**Assigned Personnel:** Agent Zieliński, Agent Mazurek

**Synopsis:** Refers to the chain of murders carried out between 03/12/2021 and 26/12/2021 on several high-standing Eastern European -- including Polish -- politicians and public figures.[[footnote]] **ARCHIVAL NOTICE:** Among the most notable victims stand Polish Minister of Justice Zbigniew Ziobro and Polish far-right politician Janusz Korwin-Mikke; for the full list of all 19 victims, refer to document #03/12/2021-A-LOG-2. [[/footnote]] All recorded victims share the following similarities:
* the possession of a high-ranking status as a member of right-wing political parties, groups, or movements in Eastern Europe;
* a history of accusations of human rights violations and abuse of power;
* a history of accusations of silencing political enemies, especially outside the boundaries of law;
* a total and seemingly instantaneous removal of all blood from their organisms.

In all cases recorded, exsanguination has been deemed the cause of the victims' deaths; their bodies are otherwise unviolated and show no signs of any manipulation or damage, magical or otherwise. Similarly, all victims were found dead within public spaces they had often frequented -- such as offices or chancelleries -- usually being reported dead only minutes after being seen in perfect health in public.

As of writing, no suspect has been identified. Recovered documents from international organizations similar in purpose to the Division operating in affected areas -- such as the [[[http://scp-int.wikidot.com/groups-of-interest-ua#DATSSU|Department of Abnormal Threats to the Security Service of Ukraine]]] or the [[[https://scpfoundation.net/scp-1390-ru|Federal Agency For the Supervision of the Abnormal]]] -- have similarly failed to identify any such person.

Each crime scene has been found devoid of physical evidence, save for the bodies themselves. Due to this, there exists no certainty that the person (or persons) responsible has stopped their actions, whatever their motivation may be -- It is therefore the Division's opinion that the murders are yet to cease and should be considered an ongoing case.

**History:** The first murder relating to the investigation was recorded on 03/12/2021 -- these activities have since continued in a sporadic and irregular manner and are yet to cease as of writing (26/12/2021). Under normal operational guidelines, the case would be classified under Alpha Priority and immediately pursued further. However, due to the heightened staff requirements on account of the ongoing [[[hour-zero|Veilfall scenario]]], the Division is unable to supply additional personnel to this investigation.

Were it not for the fact that the murders affected Zbigniew Ziobro, a high-level supporter of the operations of the Ministry of Occult Phenomena and the Division, the case would be temporarily frozen. Due to this, only Agents Zieliński and Mazurek were cleared to continue the investigation

[[/div]]

@@ @@
@@ @@

[[div class="logs"]]
[[div class="logs-header"]]
Initial Analysis
[[/div]]
[[=]]
**> RECORDING STARTS <**
[[/=]]
[[table class="dialog"]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
//Zieliński and Mazurek are standing around a desk displaying files for #03/12/2021-A. On the desk sit several photos of the victims and their bodies, as well as cross-referential documentation from recovered organizations and within the Division.//
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
 
[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**MAZUREK**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
So, #03/12/2021-A. What are we thinking?
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
//Zieliński scoffs.//
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**ZIELIŃSKI**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
What do //I// think? I think we are way too understaffed to handle this.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**MAZUREK** 
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
Right, yes, obviously. You try getting to command, though. "Veilfall takes priority" and all. I'm asking about //this// specifically.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
//Mazurek points at the photos.//
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**ZIELIŃSKI**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
Hmm. Dead politicians. Nothing new. You sure this isn't just a resurgent [[[scp-6772|Becker]]]?
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**MAZUREK** 
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
It's not him. The Front[[footnote]] **ARCHIVAL NOTICE:** Refers to the Miracle Liberation Front, a terrorist organization that had attempted to cause the collapse of the Veil while it had still existed. Some of its members have carried out relatively similar murders in the past. [[/footnote]] hasn't been active since Veilfall. Besides, last I heard he's doing [http://scpko.wikidot.com/anomalympic-hub paranormal Olympics] in Three Ports.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**ZIELIŃSKI**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
Copycat killer, then. The target demographic fits.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**MAZUREK** 
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
A copycat would actually copy though, wouldn't they. It's not like those corpses are beheaded. Same targets, but not the style. Or the actual reason Becker was even doing this in the first place.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
//Zieliński raises an eyebrow.//
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**MAZUREK**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
What? The Veil has already fallen. It's not them.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**ZIELIŃSKI**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
Right, but parabeings haven't disappeared alongside Normalcy, have they. Still has a demographic to fight for. It's them.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**MAZUREK**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
Eugh, whatever. I'll mark it as a possibility. But it's not them.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**ZIELIŃSKI**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
Point is, whoever is doing this, it's a stunt, just like Becker. Meant to attract attention. If they really just wanted those people dead, ricin in the tea also does the job and is quieter. This -- this is intentional. Nobody leaves bodies like that in the open without wanting them to be seen.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**MAZUREK**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
Right. Fair point.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**ZIELIŃSKI**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
Also, they know their stuff. There's no sign of struggle, almost no blood. It's not an amateur. Some professional, hired maybe?
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**MAZUREK**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
I'll get my boys to dig things on Valravn, but it also doesn't really feel like them. There'd be more noise and mess, and this... I don't know. It's all too quiet.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**ZIELIŃSKI**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
Hmm.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**MAZUREK**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
Indeed. What do we think about the elephant in the room, though?
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
//Zieliński chuckles.//
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**ZIELIŃSKI**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
I was about to say. Yeah, I'm thinking it's a vampire. Fits the method. Would also explain how they got in and out without being noticed.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**MAZUREK**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
No teeth marks, though. Or any virus cells. Also the corpses are too tidy. No vamp would feast without at least some spillage.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**ZIELIŃSKI**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
Different court, then? God knows there's like a million of them nowadays. I'm not a vampirologist. But not every vamp is a Red, you know.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**MAZUREK**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
Right, obviously, but this still discounts like ninety percent of all vampires.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**ZIELIŃSKI**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
But the remaining ten are an obvious fit.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**MAZUREK**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
Fine.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**ZIELIŃSKI**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
You checked for any magic contamination?
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**MAZUREK**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
Yes. Not much in that department. Some very faint EVE residual, but that could just as well be the bodies themselves generating it. If there was any magic involved, it couldn't have killed them.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**ZIELIŃSKI**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
But it's not impossible.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**MAZUREK**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
I suppose.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**ZIELIŃSKI**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
Any identifiable marks, inside or outside the body?
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**MAZUREK**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
Nothing, as far as autopsies say. Except the total lack of blood, they are in pretty much perfect condition. Also, like you said, no signs of struggle.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**ZIELIŃSKI**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
So, what? Our guys just get de-blooded in an instant, no cause?
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**MAZUREK**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
I'm not saying that. But... were that the case, it points to an interesting conclusion.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**ZIELIŃSKI**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
Which is?
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**MAZUREK**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
Shapeshifter. None of them resisted. It had to happen instantly, without them even noticing. Just -- //snap// -- and gone.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**ZIELIŃSKI**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
Or someone sneaked up on them.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**MAZUREK**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
Yeah, or just shifted into someone they didn't think would be suspicious. Hmm.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**ZIELIŃSKI**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
It's better than nothing.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**MAZUREK**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
Right. But this isn't much. "Possible Liberationist," "possible vampire," "possible mage," "possible shapeshifter." Vague at best.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**ZIELIŃSKI**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
Useless at worst.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**MAZUREK**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
Yeah. I'd try to patch in with boys at Supervision to see if they got anything new, but again, not high up their list of priorities.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
//Zieliński sighs.//
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**ZIELIŃSKI**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
So, what do we do?
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
//Mazurek shrugs.//
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**MAZUREK**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
Easiest option, I guess? Is there any ex-Front vampire mage that can shapeshift in our whole database?
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
//Momentary silence.//
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**ZIELIŃSKI**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
...Huh. What if I told you there was? 
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**MAZUREK**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
Occam's razor or something. But I wouldn't have my hopes up.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**ZIELIŃSKI**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
Right.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**MAZUREK**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
Still. I'll call Acquisitions. Last I heard they can afford to lend us a hand. And we sure as hell could use it.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]

@@ @@

[[=]]
**> RECORDING ENDS <**
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

@@ @@
@@ @@

[[div class="logs"]]
[[div class="logs-header"]]
Suspect Interrogation
[[/div]]

@@ @@

= {{🔗 One (1) file attached: Suspect File #01/AB/83-ZP ("Maciej Kowalczuk)"}}

@@ @@

[[div class="blockquote"]]

**Name:** Maciej Tomasz Kowalczuk

[[div style="height: 14px"]]
[[/div]]

**Sex:** Male

[[div style="height: 14px"]]
[[/div]]

**Age:** 29 years

[[div style="height: 14px"]]
[[/div]]

**Characteristics:** 186 cm in height. 73 kg in weight. Shoulder-long black, curly hair. Grey eyes. Burn scar on the right cheek. Type Red vampirism carry. Above-average magical talent. Former [[[sarkicism-hub|Nälkä]]] magic apprentice. Relatively proficient carnomantic shapeshifter. Former Miracle Liberation Front activist.

[[div style="height: 14px"]]
[[/div]]

**Division History:** Originally arrested during the 2014-era Miracle Liberation Front skirmishes in Esterberg and Częstochowa; breached Division policy by utilizing his carnomancy in a public space outside the allowed Esterberg no-intervention zone during the protests. Kept imprisoned for 7 years; released immediately following Veilfall with 28 other low-danger Division prisoners as per the Ziobro Accords. Re-captured during #03/12/2021-A investigations for the purpose of interrogation; put under TS/90-S[[footnote]] **ARCHIVAL NOTICE:** Refers to thaumochemical compounds manufactured by this Division that instill a subconscious need to remain honest for the duration of their operation; the effect can only be resisted by particularly skilled thaumaturgists and naturally resistant individuals. [[/footnote]] sedatives for the duration of the interview.

[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[=]]
**> RECORDING STARTS <**
[[/=]]
[[table class="dialog"]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
//Zieliński and Mazurek are standing over Kowalczuk. The suspect is sitting tied up in a chair inside Interrogation Room B/6/10. There is a bag over his head. He can be heard frantically breathing, but is unable to move.//
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
//With a quick movement of her hand, Mazurek takes the bag from Kowalczuk's head, and shines a flashlight directly at him. For a brief second, the man panics; his vampiric irises can be seen enlarging tenfold.//
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
 
[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**KOWALCZUK**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
I-- I-- I didn't— you //gotta// believe—
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**MAZUREK**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
Shut up.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**ZIELIŃSKI**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
What were you doing on the night of December 3rd?
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**KOWALCZUK**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
Don't-- Don't you-- Don't you know this already, I—
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**ZIELIŃSKI**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
What. Were you doing. On the night. //Of December 3rd?//
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
//Kowalczuk turns towards Zieliński, visibly struggling to make his figure out against the light. His breathing slightly slows down.//
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**KOWALCZUK**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
Cards! Christ. I was playing cards. With a few of my friends -- they can confirm it! Jesus. I was. At their place. Cards. Fuck.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
//Mazurek turns her flashlight off. Kowalczuk takes a few moments to calm down, and then looks at both Division operatives, a faint spark of fear in his eyes.//
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**KOWALCZUK**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
Man I, you gotta believe me! I didn't do anything, swear on my heart.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**ZIELIŃSKI**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
Your friends -- their names. Now.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**KOWALCZUK**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
I... P-Piotr Nowak. Marzena Ostrowska. Bartosz Słowacki. What... What the hell did I //do//, man?
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**MAZUREK**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
You are not yet cleared to know this.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
//Kowalczuk tries to scoff; it comes out only as gurgled coughs.//
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**KOWALCZUK**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
Right, 'course, of fuckin'—
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**ZIELIŃSKI**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
You keep up with your Front buddies recently, huh? Any secret meetings?
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**KOWALCZUK**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
No! 'Course not. They're not even in Poland — n-not that I would try! Jesus. I've been clean man, I've told you. No attacks. Nothing. What do you //think// I did?
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**MAZUREK**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
And how's that vampirism of yours recently? Still having trouble keeping it under control? Maybe you tried it on a few people your buddies wanted revenge on?
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**KOWALCZUK**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
No, Jesus. I... I did the appointments. All of them. You can see my WPhO card. It's... It's in my back pocket.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
//Zieliński starts taking items out of Kowalczuk's pocket; among a lighter and a few złoty coins and bills, he finds the card the suspect mentioned. All of the stamps are approved by appropriate officials.//
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
//Mazurek and Zieliński exchange looks, turning their sight towards the photos in Mazurek's manilla folder. She nods, and hands them over.//
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
//Zieliński leans over Kowalczuk, pointing at the dried-out bodies depicted in his hands.//
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**ZIELIŃSKI**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
Heard anything about those?
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**KOWALCZUK**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
//Jesus//. No, fuck no! What the hell, man.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**MAZUREK**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
Maciej Kowalczuk, do you understand that you are currently under suspicion of 19 cases of illegal entry via carnomantic shapeshifting and vampiric murder?
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
//Kowalczuk shakes his head.//
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**KOWALCZUK**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
You think a //vampire// did that? Christ, man. No vamp takes that much. It's— It's too much. No vamp would take this much.  We drink, but not like this! Jesus. Are they all— all dried up?
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
//Zieliński furrows his brows.//
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**ZIELIŃSKI**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
You still remain a suspect. 
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**MAZUREK**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
And may I add, your past Front connections and carnomantic abilities put you rather high up that list.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**KOWALCZUK**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
Oh come on man, that's no fair! You know I've been magic-clean. Check my EVE. Here, I-- I have another card if you want to—
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
//Kowalczuk starts moving around the chair, as if trying to reach his other pocket.//
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**KOWALCZUK**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
Besides, last I heard all Nälkä practice was banned in Poland, "unless under—"
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
//Zieliński winces, and suddenly sighs.//
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**ZIELIŃSKI**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
Fuck.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
**Addendum #03/12/2021-A-1:** Following the completion of Suspect #01/AB/83-ZP's interrogation, his memory of the events was properly dealt with, and he was released back into his house in Częstochowa. An appropriate explanation for his 7-hour disappearance was presented to him and his closest accomplices by Division personnel as per standard protocol.

Meanwhile, Agents Zieliński and Mazurek re-assessed the already available facts relating to #03/12/2021-A, with the added context for Zieliński's new ideas. Their research revealed that all of the victims of the murders did indeed share another common characteristic that had previously been overlooked -- all of them have been accused of, at some point in their lives, willingly approving behind-Veil laws or regulations that significantly infringed upon or limited the rights of Nälkä peoples within their countries.
[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[/div]]

@@ @@

= {{🔗 One (1) file attached: Informant File #98/KS/91-PA ("The Old Witch)"}}

@@ @@

[[div class="blockquote"]]

**Name:** Unknown; colloquially referred to as "The Old Witch" or simply "The Witch" and "The Sage" by Divison personnel

[[div style="height: 14px"]]
[[/div]]

**Sex:** Unknown, if even applies

[[div style="height: 14px"]]
[[/div]]

**Age:** Unknown

[[div style="height: 14px"]]
[[/div]]

**Characteristics:** 328 cm in height. 785 kg in weight. Former human. Body augmented by Nälkä carnomancy to such a degree as to be virtually impossible to classify as "humanoid." Resembles a grotesque creature of flesh full of limbs engraved with runes and several head-like constructs with long, silver hair and gouged-out eyes. Despite this, remains sentient and sapient and is fully capable of speech and logical thought. Half-fused with the building it resides in to such a degree that it is incapable of locomotion. Requires no sustenance to survive.

[[div style="height: 14px"]]
[[/div]]

**Division History:** Subject was initially discovered during the Cold War-era OPERATION CHRISTBREAKER ventures into the Russian North for the purposes of recapturing Polish thaumic assets involved with proto-Nälkä societies and individuals residing within. Since discovery, has acted as a constant source of information relating to Nälkä history, culture, and practice to the Divison -- the only thing it wishes in return for its information is human contact for the purpose of conversation once in a week. Identified to have acted as an "archive" and guide to many proto-Nälkä peoples of the Russian North for numerous generations, including the societies eliminated by OPERATION CHRISTBREAKER.

[[div style="height: 14px"]]
[[/div]]

**Important:** All personnel interacting with the subject are to imperatively uphold the illusion that the Division represents the interests of the Nälkä peoples and that it is staffed by followers of the doctrine; the subject has only agreed to cooperate with the Division under the pretense that the Division is a Nälkä group.
[[/div]]

The Agents comply.//

[[hcell]]
**ZIELIŃSKI**
[[/hcell]]

[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**MAZUREK**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
<We are glad to say that we rejoice to finally have another chance at meeting you as well, O Sage.>
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
//The Witch's non-eyes all turn toward both of the Agents as the being puts its hands together.//
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**THE WITCH**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
<How can I be of help this time, my dears? Is it the shade-brew? Or perhaps have my previous instructions proven unclear? I was a little worried they would not-->
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
//Zieliński smiles politely.//
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**ZIELIŃSKI**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
<It is nothing of the sort, O Sage.>
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**MAZUREK**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
<We come before you today to humbly ask for your help with a new conundrum.>
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
//The Witch tilts its heads.//
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**THE WITCH**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
<And what may that be?>

[[hcell]]
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]

A few moments later, it frowns with pain and worry as it gives the photos back to Zieliński.//
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]

[[hcell]]
**THE WITCH**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
<On my old chains. I... What is the meaning of this, dears?>
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**ZIELIŃSKI**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
<We apologize for bringing before you these awful images, but we have met a dead end in our study. There is simply nobody else we could turn to.>
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**MAZUREK**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
<These pictures depict our good friends, all of them murdered in cold blood. We have information that may suggest they were slain by those that dare misshape the Nälkä practice for the sake of their own greed.>
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**ZIELIŃSKI**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
<We come before you to ask whether you know anything of such a brutal technique as was used on these poor people.>
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
//The Witch slowly shakes its head.//
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**THE WITCH**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
<My dears, I... I do not know who told you these are the work of our kin. The practice you've shown me -- the vile act of stealing one's blood -- it is the work of the Old Empire.[[footnote]] **ARCHIVAL NOTICE:** Refers to the ancient Daevite Empire, the former captors of the Nälkä people prior to their rebellion and the formation of their faith. [[/footnote]] Or, at the very least, someone who had tried to imitate the brutal work of the Empire's murderers.>
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**THE WITCH**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
<Truth be told, I... I do not know who might have done this. There are only a few among us who have ever dared venture into these areas of the Art -- but I would not worry about them having done this. Master Ion has long taken care of them.>
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**MAZUREK**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
<We worry, O Sage, that if we do not find the one responsible, our friends will never be safe. We suspect that the heathen who had caused all of this utilizes carnomantic shapeshifting to change their form to ambush their victims. Can you tell us more about it?>
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**THE WITCH**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
<To change one's flesh so easily, with so little bounds and with so little time -- it takes a true master of the craft to even hope to achieve it. But to master it, over and over, to repeatedly and seamlessly blend into perfect images of another man? I can perhaps think of Five practitioners who have reached such a mastery of this skill -- and I dare not even //think// about them having caused this.>
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
//The Witch sighs, the movement slumping its heavy body once again against the wall of the house.//
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**THE WITCH**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
<I'm truly sorry, dears, but I cannot help you. If it was me whose friends had gone like this, I'd suggest looking into those who could even know of -- let alone handle -- the repulsive crafts of the Empire. This, I believe, would be the line of deduction most promising here.>
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**MAZUREK**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
<O Sage, me and my friend thank you dearly. Your insights have been most valuable, and we cannot emphasize how grateful we are for your continued wisdom>
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
//Once again, the Agents bow, and start to walk towards the exit.//
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**THE WITCH**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
<Before you go, dears, there is something more I believe you should do.>
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
//The Agents stop midway, and raise their eyebrows.//
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**THE WITCH**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
<Whoever your murderer might be, whoever dares to raise their hands against such people of faith as yourself -- be careful. I do not know them -- nor do I know much about them -- but if they are yet to cease in their spree, it is unlikely that they will anytime soon. Inform your friends. Come to them personally. Perhaps then, once you finally face the killer, shall you not only protect your closest, but also see who dares attack your kin.>
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
**Addendum #03/12/2021-A-2:** In light of the new information -- as well as advice offered by the Witch -- Agents Zieliński and Mazurek proceeded to identify and catalog all of the remaining individuals that were at threat of becoming future #03/12/2021-A victims. They then sorted them all from the most likely to the least likely to suffer such an attack, as dictated by their position and influence over the approval of the anti-Nälkä regulations.

Due to the scarcity of resources, Division Command advised that the Agents only attend to the most likely future victim in order to prevent the possible attempt on their life and / or identify the individual(s) responsible for the ongoing murders. 
[[/div]]

[[cell]]
//Zieliński and Mazurek are walking down one of the corridors of the Polish Parliament building. They are trying their best to avoid all of the journalists that are blocking almost all space within the building; some of them actively attempt to ask the Agents about the ongoing Veilfall scenario. Instead of replying, Zieliński just shows them his badge -- briefly enough for them to notice his importance but not long enough to actually identify him. The moment the journalists glance at the Division insignia, they quickly back off, letting the two pass.//
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
//The two Agents quicken their pace, heading towards one of the conference rooms. They both grab their weapons, exchange looks, and nod. Mazurek firmly knocks on the door thrice. When after a moment, no answer comes, they both come barging in, breaking down the door and entering the room.//
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
//Before them, the dead body of Przemysław Czarnek[[footnote]] **ARCHIVAL NOTICE:** The Polish Minister of Education. [[/footnote]] lays on the floor; just like the remainder of the #03/12/2021-A victims, it is entirely devoid of blood and has no other wounds inflicted upon it. Above it, a circle made up of blood is levitating slowly; moments later, it turns into a stream that shoots out towards one of the windows at the other end of the room.//
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
//The two Agents look up, and notice a small hooded figure crouching on the windowsill. The blood stream stops at their hand as it crystalizes into a small shard. The figure takes the newly-formed crystal and attaches it onto a necklace around their neck; within its ropes, 19 other crystals are already located. The figure smiles, and it too looks up.//
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
//The very moment the figure notices the two Agents, their smile fades and turns into a grimace. The murderer lets out an angry shriek, a serpentine tongue and long teeth visible inside their mouth, and jumps out of the window next to them, shattering the glass and sending the shards towards Mazurek and Zieliński.//
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
//Without as much as flinching, the two shield themselves with their left hands and start to sprint towards the window. Zieliński curses as he takes the lead -- moments later, both of them are standing on the exterior windowsill, looking down in search of the escapee. They squint their eyes and aim their weapons, frantically eyeing the dark surroundings of the Warsaw night.//
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**ZIELIŃSKI**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]
There!
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]

Before any of the Agents can shoot at them, they snap their fingers, resulting in the fabric of reality ripping apart below them; in the space that had once been the ground, there now sits a pulsating, flesh-like red pit that rhythmically breathes in and out. Around it, sparks of magical energy can be seen; the inside of its "throat" widens as its portal membrane makes itself manifest. The small figure hisses again and jumps inside the portal.//
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]

[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]

Above them, the small figure looms; their face is twisted in a snarl, and their finger is pointing directly at the Division operatives. Within their palm, a sigil depicting three snakes surrounded in a circle is tattooed.//
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[hcell]]

[[/hcell]]

[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]

[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**UNKNOWN**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]

[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
//Mazurek looks at Zieliński; he has relatively calmed down, trying his best to wrap his hand around in his clothes. She changes her sight to meet that of the murderer, even if their eyes are covered by the long hood. Her own face is stone-cold.//
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**MAZUREK**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]

Their hands all hold knives; their eyes are all focused on the two Agents.//

[[row]]

[[cell class="active"]]

[[/hcell]]

[[row]]
[[hcell]]
**UNKNOWN**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell class="active"]]

[[hcell]]
[[/hcell]]

[[div class="windows-bar"]]
ZM "WITCH SLAYER" DIVISION E-MAIL
[[/div]]
[[div class="windows"]]
__F__ile@@    @@__I__nbox@@    @@__N__ew Mail
-----
**TO:** [[span class="windows-slimbox"]]zmcommand@gov_internal.pl[[/span]]
[[div class="windows-box"]]
Respectable sirs and madams,

[[div style="height: 14px"]]
[[/div]]

Forgive the time and my tone, but this is a matter of utmost urgency -- I'm writing this right as I board a helicopter to HQ. I'm running to you almost directly from a battlefield. (Zieliński is in appropriate hands. Hurt, but stable; he'll live). I do not know how much time we've got to spare.

[[div style="height: 14px"]]
[[/div]]

The confrontation with the #03/12/2021-A murderer was far from a success -- in the end, they got away, and it almost cost us the life of two Agents to try and stop it from happening. But it wasn't a total failure -- we heard their voice and their words. And we saw their //sigil// -- three entangled snakes, all surrounded by a single circle.

[[div style="height: 14px"]]
[[/div]]

Their words, too, back up what I am about to propose. I may not personally know [[[old-adytite-language|Ämärangnä]]], but I'd trust our local B/6 linguopath with my life. She says the words they spoke just after shooting Zieliński mean, and I quote: //"Contact the others. Tell them I've taken care of the [dogs / beasts] for now, but that they will soon return. We cannot take any more risks. Not until we are [done / finished / complete]."//

[[div style="height: 14px"]]
[[/div]]

I hope I do not need to tell you what a threat a re-emergent Klavigar Saarn poses.

[[div style="height: 14px"]]
[[/div]]

What's even more worrying is that this isn't just an isolated incident; Supervision tells me they have unconfirmed reports about [[[sarkic-heat|a ten-meter horned warrior following Vanguard staff]]]. There's also been rumors of a many-handed figure being spotted around Prague and Alexandrian libraries. And while it would be a stretch to say from the intel we have gathered that what apparently lurks beneath the [[[scp-2191|Hoia Forest]]] is Lovataar, it would also be dishonest to call the two unrelated.

[[div style="height: 14px"]]
[[/div]]

With all of this in mind, I must therefore ask: what the //hell// are the four Klavigars up to? What is so important that all four of them have seemingly only now decided to stop their millennia-old slumber, and reveal themselves to the world at large? 

[[div style="height: 14px"]]
[[/div]]

And, most importantly of all, can we truly be sure it is //just// the [[[scp-6500|Impasse]]] that has caused this?

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
